name: function: reduce velocity
Lights
info:
**Mode and capabilities**
0 = off
1 = dim
2 = flash --> left side and right side single control
3 = pulsation
4 = rotation
5 = running

**Groups**
left_side
right_side
all

name: Drive Forward
format: arrow_upward

name: Drive Backward
format: arrow_downward

name: Drive Right

name: Drive Up Left

name: Drive Down Right
